thread.title: Now hiring: Techie edition

author: left_col_positional_height){$(rel).addClass('cm-outset-left');}});}});})(cmg.query);}());
title: Now hiring: Techie edition
text:
1. Middleware engineer : Orpine of Alpharetta is seeking a middleware engineer to administer and configure WebSphere MQ and WebSphere DataPower SOA appliance; design and develop WebSphere MB message flows and message sets using toolkit. [ Apply today ]
2. Automation tester : Orpine is seeking an automation tester to analyze and ensure quality of applications before production using QC, QTP, Win Runner, Selenium IDE, Selenium Webdriver, Soup UI, Rest Client and more. [ Apply today ]
3. Systems analyst : Ebix of Johns Creek needs a systems analyst to provide product support to clients and investigate/resolve app functionality issues. [ Apply today ]
4. Software engineers : SolGenie of Suwanee is seeking software engineers to perform solutions architecture, design, configuration and administration of SAP PI and XI for various industries. [ Apply today ]
5. Business analyst : Nebula Partners of Alpharetta is looking for a business analyst to manage JAD sessions, business requisitions, prepare business requisitions documents. [ Apply today ]
6. Lead .net developer : Pyramid Consulting of Alpharetta seeks a lead .net developer to manage design banking, insurance and pharma software. [ Apply today ]
7. Solution architect / app development : Pyramid Consulting of Alpharetta seeks a solution architect to design multi-tier enterprise applications with Java/J2EE tech, more. [ Apply today ]
8. Sr. developer : Intercontinental Exchange Holdings of Atlanta seeks a sr. developer to develop, extend and support major software applications for ICE clearing business. [ Apply today ]
9. Sr. systems engineer : Intercontinental Exchange Holdings of Atlanta seeks a sr. systems engineer to create and maintain high-performance, low-latency systems in mixed UNIX and Windows development, more. [ Apply today ]
10. Software engineer : Palatial Technologies of Alpharetta is seeking a software engineer to design and develop Oracle applications using Oracle E-Business Suite, Oracle Forms/Reports, Oracle BI Publisher, more. [ Apply today ]
11. Oracle RPAS consultant : Pyramid Consulting of Alpharetta seeks an Oracle RPAS consultant to design Oracle RPAS process for MFP, Oracle RPAS, AIX 5.3, Unix shell scripting, SQL, more. [ Apply today ]
12. Manager / Model development : Synchrony Financial in Alpharetta is seeking a candidate to manage the design, development, documentation, approval, implementation and monitoring of enterprise wide models. [ Apply today ]
13. Sr. consultant : Pyramid Consulting of Alpharetta seeks sr. consultant to prepare functionalityy specs., configure SAP modules, more. [ Apply today ]
14. Test automation engineer : Intercontinental Exchange Holdings of Atlanta seeks a test automation engineer to develop, maintain and execute automation test scripts involving Java, XML, FIXML. [ Apply today ]
15. Java lead developer : Accenture of Atlanta seeks a Java lead developer to integrate business needs of clientele with their IT systems; design/develop/build/deploy IT application; contribute to all phases of the SDLC including requisition. [ Apply today ]
